scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains photographs of William Ritenous Denny, Eugene Ellis Vann, the Felix Augustus Vann family, and John Henry Denny. In addition, there is a chronology of the life of Collins Denny, Sr.

did.unittitle: Photograph and negative of William Ritman Denny as a baby, son of Collins and Lucy Chapman Denny. n. d.
Photograph and negative of Eugene Ellis Vann. n. d.
Photograph and negative of the Rev. Felix Augustus Vann, Mrs. Milissa Rose Huffman Vann, and sons Eugene Ellis Vann, Clyde Harold Vann, Robert Joel Vann, and Felix Monroe Vann. n. d.
Chronology of Collins Denny, Sr. by Elizabeth C. Denny Vann 1972 Sept.
Genealogical note re: Bishop and Mrs. Denny's children ca. 1973
Photograph and negative of John Henry Denny, son of Col. William R. Denny and youngest brother of Bishop Collins Denny. 1880 May
Photograph and negative of William R. Denny, Jr. - at 3 months of age. ca. 1888?
